meanings.definition: Prepared or served in the style of Burgundy.
meanings.sent1: The bourguignonne sauce added a rich flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served a delicious bourguignonne stew.
meanings.sent3: The bourguignonne tablecloth made the dining room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her bourguignonne dress was the talk of the party.
meanings.sent5: The bourguignonne decorations gave the event a festive touch.

meanings.definition: A dish, typically involving meat cooked in red wine with onions and mushrooms.
meanings.sent1: The beef bourguignonne was a hit at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: She learned to make chicken bourguignonne from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The bourguignonne recipe called for a pinch of magic.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering bourguignonne filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The hearty bourguignonne warmed them up on a cold evening.
